title: Set up a project with Segger Embedded Studio
description: Configure Segger Embedded Studio for use with nRF Connect SDK

steps.title: Start Segger Embedded Studio
steps.description:
Go to the location where you installed Segger Embedded Studio

Go to the *bin* folder

Execute *emStudio*

steps.title: Open a project
steps.description: Click the file menu *File > Open nRF Connect SDK Project...*

steps.title: Choose paths
steps.description:
Choose the paths for the different parameters

**Zephyr Base** should be *<sourcecode_root>/zephyr*

**CMakeLists.txt** should be a link to the projects file for your project, i.e. *<sourcecode_root>/nrf/samples/bluetooth/hids_mouse/CMakeLists.txt*

**Build Directory** should be the location to build to, i.e. *<sourcecode_root>/nrf/samples/bluetooth/hids_mouse/build*

**Board Directory** should be the location of the board description of your development kit, i.e. *<sourcecode_root>/nrf/boards/arm/nrf52840_pca20041*

**GNU ARM Embedded Toolchain Directory** should be the location where you installed your GNU ARM Embedded Toolchain, i.e. *c:\gnuarmemb*
